indicatorTemplateXML.author: Colcamex Resources Inc. for Oscar EMR

heading.name: Patient Care: Colorectal Cancer Screening
heading.definition: Patient Care: Colorectal Cancer Screening: % of patients aged 50 to 74 years old, inclusive, with an FOBT within the past two years, sigmoidoscopy within 5 years or a colonoscopy within the past 10 years. - patients with a null or “pending” prevention result are overdue.
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from CIHI’s 2012 Indicator Technical Specifications (Nov 2012)

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.colo > 0 OR fin.fobt > 0 OR fin.fobtm > 0, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS '% With One Test',
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, COUNT(fin.patient) - SUM( IF( fin.colo > 0 OR fin.fobt > 0 OR fin.fobtm > 0, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS '% With No Tests'
FROM (
SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, COLO.id AS colo, FOBT.id AS fobt, FOBTM.dataField AS fobtm
FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN dxresearch dxr ON ( d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no)
-- Look for colonoscopy results from the last 120 months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, p.id, pe.val FROM preventions p INNER JOIN preventionsExt pe ON (pe.prevention_id = p.id AND pe.keyval LIKE "result") WHERE p.prevention_type = ${colonoscopy} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 AND DATE(p.prevention_date) > ${lowerLimit.date120} GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.demographic_no) > -1 ) COLO ON (d.demographic_no = COLO.demographic_no )
-- Look for FOBT req from the last 24 months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, p.id, pe.val FROM preventions p INNER JOIN preventionsExt pe ON (pe.prevention_id = p.id AND pe.keyval LIKE "result") WHERE p.prevention_type = ${preventionfobt} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 AND DATE(p.prevention_date) > ${lowerLimit.date24} GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.demographic_no) > -1 ) FOBT ON (d.demographic_no = FOBT.demographic_no )
-- Look for possible FOBT results in measurements. LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.dataField, m.demographicNo FROM measurements m
JOIN ( SELECT MAX(`name`) AS 'name' FROM measurementMap WHERE loinc_code IN ${loincfobt} GROUP BY `name` ) mm ON (mm.`name` = m.type)
WHERE DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date24} AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) FOBTM ON (d.demographic_no = FOBTM.demographicNo)
-- WHERE THE PATIENT'S AGE AT THE TIME OF THE COLONOSCOPY ... -- Excluding patients previously diagnosed. WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND IFNULL(dxr.dxresearch_code,-1) NOT IN ${dxexclusions} AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) / 365.25 ) ) BETWEEN ${lowerLimit.age} AND ${upperLimit.age} GROUP BY d.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(d.demographic_no) > -1 ) fin

drillDownQuery.query:
SELECT * FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN dxresearch dxr ON ( d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no)
-- Look for colonoscopy results from the last 120 months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, p.id, pe.val, p.prevention_date FROM preventions p INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM preventions WHERE prevention_type = ${colonoscopy} AND deleted = 0 AND DATE(prevention_date) > ${lowerLimit.date120} GROUP BY demographic_no )p2 ON(p2.id = p.id) LEFT JOIN preventionsExt pe ON (pe.prevention_id = p.id AND pe.keyval LIKE "result") ) COLO ON (d.demographic_no = COLO.demographic_no )
-- Look for FOBT req from the last 24 months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, p.id, pe.val, p.prevention_date FROM preventions p INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM preventions WHERE prevention_type = ${preventionfobt} AND deleted = 0 AND DATE(prevention_date) > ${lowerLimit.date24} GROUP BY demographic_no )p2 ON(p2.id = p.id) LEFT JOIN preventionsExt pe ON (pe.prevention_id = p.id AND pe.keyval LIKE "result") ) FOBT ON (d.demographic_no = FOBT.demographic_no )
-- Look for possible FOBT results in measurements. LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo, m1.dateObserved FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements m JOIN ( SELECT MAX(`name`) AS 'name' FROM measurementMap WHERE loinc_code IN ${loincfobt} GROUP BY `name` ) mm ON (mm.`name` = m.type) WHERE DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date24} AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo ) m2 ON (m1.id = m2.id) ) FOBTM ON (d.demographic_no = FOBTM.demographicNo)
-- WHERE THE PATIENT'S AGE AT THE TIME OF THE COLONOSCOPY -- Exclude Cancer diagnosis. WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND IFNULL(dxr.dxresearch_code,-1) NOT IN ${dxexclusions} AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), NOW() ) / 365.25 ) ) BETWEEN ${lowerLimit.age} AND ${upperLimit.age} GROUP BY d.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(d.demographic_no) > -1
